Posts.Content: May 14, 2017 12:08AM SandraR wrote: I am eight years post lumpectomy and removal of lymph nodes. I was in a group of people recently and was wondering who smelled like my Grandma! When I got home I realized it was me!! This is something new, eight years later! Only on the one side. I've changed deodorants, but three weeks later and it's back. I'm glad to see that others have this problem, not so happy to have it tho. Thanks for the forum, so I know why
Posts.Title: STINKY...B O...Lump side only,any thoughts?? somanywomen debm1955
